===Overview===
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission ('''SEC''') is an independent [[United States of America|American]] organization based out of [[Washington, D.C.]], thus is under federal jurisdiction.

====Origin====
The SEC was founded in 1934 in response to the 1929 Stock Market Crash, so as to investigate and prevent future events of financial manipulation.

=== Modern Era ===
SEC Agent Charlie Boatner and FBI agent Bala Nenon requested Avenger [[Dane Whitman (Earth-616)|Dane Whitman]] help investigate [[Malcolm Drake (Earth-616)|Malcolm Drake]], a dragon suspected of using his magical and intellectual influence gold markets. However, Drake was discovered to have been framed by [[Malekith (Earth-616)|Malekith]], with Boatner and Nenon as trolls gaslighting the Whitman and Drake into fighting with anger inducing magics. Their spell was overcame, with Whitman and Drake resolving the matter cooperatively.{{r|Heroes for Hire Vol 1 14}}
